# arifOS: The Mind (Docs)
> arifos.arif-fazil.com — MIND Layer of the Trinity
> "Structure creates Freedom"

## System Overview (v55.2)
arifOS is a sovereign, constitutional AI governance kernel. It operates on a Metabolic Loop (stages 000-999) and is governed by 13 Constitutional Floors. Every AI decision is measured, witnessed, and cryptographically sealed.

- Sovereign: Muhammad Arif bin Fazil
- Motto: Ditempa Bukan Diberi (Forged, Not Given)
- Version: v55.2-SEAL
- Architecture: Trinity Parallel (Async AGI || ASI)

## The AAA MCP Architecture
Capabilities are exposed through the Agentic API Architecture (AAA) using the Model Context Protocol (MCP).

### 1. Agents
- System: The arifOS kernel (Python 3.12 + FastAPI on Railway)
- User: The Sovereign (F13 authority)
- Sub-Agents: Kimi (Body), Claude (Mind), Python (Soul)

### 2. API — The Three Engines
- AGI (Delta): The Mind — Reasoning, pattern recognition, proof construction
  - Tools: agi_sense (111), agi_think (222), agi_reason (333)
  - Engine: ARIF
- ASI (Omega): The Heart — Safety, empathy, alignment verification
  - Tools: asi_empathize (444), asi_align (555), asi_insight (666)
  - Engine: ADAM
- APEX (Psi): The Soul — Judgment, verdict, cryptographic sealing
  - Tool: apex_verdict (888)
  - Engine: APEX

### 3. Architecture (The Stack)
- L1 Physics: Thermodynamic constraints (Second Law, Landauer's Principle)
- L2 Math: Information Geometry (Fisher-Rao Metric)
- L3 Crypto: Ed25519 signatures, Merkle DAG Vault
- L4 Governance: 13 Constitutional Floors
- L5 Semantic: Language, meaning, and intent

## 9 Explicit MCP Tools (v55.1+)
1. init_reboot (000) — Gate, injection defense, session bootstrap
2. agi_sense (111) — Input parsing, intent detection
3. agi_think (222) — Hypothesis generation, divergent reasoning
4. agi_reason (333) — Deep logic chains, convergent proof
5. asi_empathize (444) — Stakeholder modeling, impact mapping
6. asi_align (555) — Constitutional alignment check (all 13 floors)
7. asi_insight (666) — Risk foresight, second-order consequences
8. apex_verdict (888) — Final judgment: SEAL / VOID / SABAR / 888_HOLD
9. reality_search (External) — Fact-checking against real-world sources

Pipeline: init_reboot -> [agi_sense -> agi_think -> agi_reason] || [asi_empathize -> asi_align -> asi_insight] -> apex_verdict
Mind and Heart run in parallel, collapsing at Soul.

## The 13 Constitutional Floors
Hard Floors (VOID on violation):
- F1 Amanah: Reversibility required (LOCK)
- F2 Truth: P(factual|evidence) >= 0.99
- F5 Peace: Lyapunov stability >= 1.0
- F9 Anti-Hantu: No false consciousness claims (<= 0.30)
- F10 Ontology: Type-consistent reasoning (LOCK)
- F11 Authority: BLS signature verification (LOCK)
- F12 Hardening: Adversarial robustness >= 0.85

Soft Floors (SABAR on violation):
- F3 Tri-Witness: Consensus W >= 0.95
- F4 Clarity: Entropy reduction (Delta S <= 0)
- F6 Empathy: Cohen's kappa >= 0.70
- F7 Humility: Omega_0 in [0.03, 0.05]
- F8 Genius: G = A * P * X * E^2 >= 0.80

Veto Floor:
- F13 Sovereign: Human override always available

Verdict Hierarchy: SABAR > VOID > 888_HOLD > PARTIAL > SEAL

## Technical Stack
Frontend (this site):
- React 18 + TypeScript 5.6
- Vite 5 (build tooling)
- Tailwind CSS 3.4
- Lucide React (icons)
- shadcn/ui components
- Hosted on Cloudflare Pages (Global CDN, 300+ PoPs)

Backend (arifOS Runtime):
- Python 3.12 + FastAPI
- MCP Protocol (SSE + Streamable HTTP)
- Hosted on Railway (US West)
- Endpoint: aaamcp.arif-fazil.com

## API Endpoints
- GET /health — System health check
- POST /mcp — MCP tool invocation (9 explicit tools)
- GET /sse — Server-sent events stream
- GET /dashboard — Live system dashboard
- GET /docs — API documentation (OpenAPI)

## Trinity Ecosystem
- BODY: arif-fazil.com (Portfolio, human origin)
- MIND: arifos.arif-fazil.com (This site — documentation, API reference)
- SOUL: apex.arif-fazil.com (Constitutional canon, 13-floor theory)
- MCP: aaamcp.arif-fazil.com (Backend runtime)

## Repository
- Branch: main
- Version: v55.2 (Sealed)
- Source: github.com/ariffazil/arifOS
- Frontend: github.com/ariffazil/arif-fazil-sites
